Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.luupanu.skrapple.domain.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Player>

    public class Player
extends Object
implements Comparable<Player>
    The main Player class. Players have a name, their own Rack and a score counter.
    Author:
    panu
